// Typography.js copied from component-library
import React from'react';/**
 * Typography component for consistent text styles
 * @param {string} variant - h1, h2, h3, label, p
 * @param {string} className - Additional classes
 * @param {React.ReactNode} children
 */import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export default function Typography(_ref){let{variant='p',className='',children}=_ref;switch(variant){case'h1':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{className:"text-3xl font-bold text-gray-900 ".concat(className),children:children});case'h2':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{className:"text-2xl font-bold text-gray-900 ".concat(className),children:children});case'h3':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"text-xl font-semibold text-gray-800 ".concat(className),children:children});case'label':return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"text-xs font-medium uppercase tracking-wide text-gray-500 ".concat(className),children:children});default:return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"text-base text-gray-700 ".concat(className),children:children});}}
